channel.title: Rock and Metal Bands
channel.description:
Hey. So I'm sure we all like a rock/metal band or two?
The problem, I find, is actually finding the music. I never know what to search for. I'm going to list a few bands I know of that I think are good and if you have any to contribute I'll add them to the list.
That way we can find out about new bands that we might like.
[b]speljohan's music playlist (26,531 songs):[/b] http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/playlist.html
[ul]+44 2mxpx 3 Doors Down 30stm A Change of Pace A Day To Remember A Perfect Circle A Skylight Drive A7X (Avenged Sevenfold) Alesana All Time Low All That Remains Alkaline Trio Alter Bridge Amber Pacific Anberlin Angels and Airwaves Anthrax Armor For Sleep As I Lay Dying Asking Alexandria August Burns Red Bad Religion Billy Talent Black Veil Brides Blessthefall Blind Blink 182 Bowling For Soup Breaking Benjamin Bring Me The Horizon Brokencyde Busted Bullet For My Valentine Cage The Elephant Creed Crossfade Death in December Disturbed Enter Shikari Escape The Fate Eyes Set To Kill Faber Drive Fall Out Boy Falling In Reverse Fear Factory Fit For Rivals Flyleaf From Autumn to Ashes Godsmack Good Charlotte Hollywood Undead Hoobastank I Am Ghost Jimmy Eat World Kids in Glass Houses Killswitch Engage Kings of Leon Korn Krezip Lamb of God Limp Bizkit Linkin' Park Lost Prophets Lower Than Atlantis Kreator Making April Megadeath Metallica Middle Class Rut Millencolin Modern Day Escape Municipal Waste Muse My Chemical Romance Obituary Silent Civilian Slipknot Panic At The Disco Papa Roach Paramore Parkway Drive Pierce The Veil Poets of the Fall R.E.M. Relient K Rise Against Mayday Parade Scary Kids Scaring Kids Silverstein Simple Plan Skillet Slayer Static FM Story of the Year Suicidal Tendencies Sum 41 System of a Down Taking Back Sunday The Birthday Massacre The Devil Wears Prada The Jamestown Story The Krimns The Red Jump Suit Apparatus The White Stripes The Word Alive Thousand Foot Krutch Three Days Grace Tool Trivium Unearth Veara We Came As Romans We The Kings Zornik[/ul]

The problem, I find, is actually finding the music. I never know what to search for. I’m going to list a few bands I know of that I think are good and if you have any to contribute I’ll add them to the list.

item.title: Rock and Metal Bands
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

reyx7:

Why is kings of Leon on the list u Hipster.

Because I didn’t know a word that generalized greb, emo, indy, metal, rock and metal-head music into one so I just said Rock and Metal. People who like Rock and Metal are bound to like something in the other genres.

@spel Holy shit?

Read full topic
